EmailTemplate.subject: Check out Primus Elite Enhanced Features in Action!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> <[[http://standardaero.com/]]>
Now that Primus Elite is available for the Lear 45, you may be wondering if it is it worth it to upgrade your cockpit or if you should keep flying it as-is. Or maybe you are considering getting a new airplane with the current technology, despite losing substantial equity.
When NASCAR Champion Brad Keselowski updated his Lear 45 with Primus Elite, his pilot, Joey Meier, couldnâ€™t have been happier. Click below to see Primus Elite in action and hear Joey talk about his satisfaction with the brighter, clearer, high-res picture and enhanced features the upgrade provides.
<[[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0RiXoma4jlI]]>
Ready to upgrade? Through December 31, 2019, you are eligible to save up to $140k on your upgrade thanks to Honeywell trade-in credits, plus qualify for special incentives on your Honeywell Maintenance Service Plan contract. Click below to get in touch with StandardAero and learn more!
GET IN TOUCH! <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/Primus_Elite_StandardAero_201903.html?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=19_ch_amer_bga_stda_primuselite]]>
